comment.author: 32759767@N08
comment._content: Note - the reference to "new post office" should not mislead.  This is located on West Street, Keene, and no longer the site of the post office

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: Right, we now have a new, new post office, on Main Street. Thanks!
